{"step_by_step_thinking": "Ameloblastoma is a benign, slow-growing but locally aggressive tumor. Multicystic ameloblastoma is the most common type and has a high recurrence rate. Surgical enucleation is a common treatment, but it has a high recurrence rate because the tumor often infiltrates the surrounding bone. The recurrence rate is generally reported to be between 50% and 90%.", "answer_choice": "C. 50-100%"}
